solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--      public List<Integer> getRow(int rowIndex) {--newline--        List<Integer> list = new ArrayList<Integer>();--newline--        if (rowIndex < 0)--newline--            return list;--newline--    --newline--        for (int i = 0; i < rowIndex + 1; i++) {--newline--            list.add(0, 1);--newline--            for (int j = 1; j < list.size() - 1; j++) {--newline--                list.set(j, list.get(j) + list.get(j + 1));--newline--            }--newline--        }--newline--        return list;--newline--    }--newline--}
